title: yAr sheida shUdayyanE
sahitya:
yAr sheida shUdayyanE nI en mukham pArAmal um-enriruppaduvum


anupallavi

  pArellAm purandiDum paramAnanda duraiyE parivAgavE shaTrE urai un manakkuraiyai


caraNam 1    kAmi rAkSasi sheida kaivElai shUdO kaTTukk-aDangA nAtti kaTTiviTTa vAdO
mAmiyAi amul sheyyum mamataiyin tOdO maccaramAgiya maittunar tUdO
    caraNam 2    guNDuNi rAman shol koNDiyiduvO kuTTik-kalagam shei kuppanin satiyO
aNDai vITTukkAriyin AshaikkaN valaiyO anniya mAyattil aghappaTTa nilaiyO
